text: The 2016 Summer Paralympics are running from Wednesday 7 September to Sunday 18 September, in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. This is a chronological summary of the major events that took place during the course of the Games. ==Calendar== ==Medal table== ==Day 0 — Thursday 5 May== ;link= Opening ceremony *The opening ceremony of the 2016 Summer Paralympics took place on the evening of 7 September 2016 at the Maracanã Stadium, Rio de Janeiro, starting at 18:30 BRT (21:30 UTC). ==Day 1 — Thursday 8 September==
